item.title: Catatan Java Script
item.description: Catatan Javascript add script get json event klick live search const search = document.getElementById("search"); const results = document.getElementById("results"); let search_term = ""; // default count let klikCount = 0; // when search bar klick search.addEventListener("click", () => { // add +1 klikCount++; // when klick <= 1 do this else nothing if (klikCount = 1) { let url = '/index.json'; fetch(url) .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => { const showList = () => { results.
